text: Jonathan Peter Culshaw (born 2 June 1968) is an English actor, comedian and impressionist. He is best known for his work on the radio comedy Dead Ringers since 2000. Culshaw has voiced many characters for ITV shows including 2DTV (2001), Spitting Image (1994–96) and Newzoids (2015–2016), as well as appearing in The Impressions Show alongside Debra Stephenson from 2009 until 2011. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:English comedians Category:English movie actors Category:English radio personalities Category:English television actors Category:English television personalities Category:English voice actors
title: Jon Culshaw
